name: De Belgische beroepsvereniging van fabrikanten, distributeurs en dienstverleners en de professionele eindgebruikers inzake veiligheid en welzijn op het werk en in de vrije tijd
membership:
member of E.S.F - European Safety Federation (www.eu-esf.org),
close coorperation with the Belgian national goverment
goal:
To promote health and safety management and culture in the workplace and enhance health and safety awareness along the whole value chain from prevention to protection.
To gain a hearing in legislation, implementation, market surveillance and standardisation mainly in the field of PPE taking into account sustainability.
interests: Business and Industry, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market
euInitiatives: Implementation of the PPE Regulation (EU) 425/2016 and the implementation of Directive 89/656/EEC
